caption.p: (A) Rate of net photosynthesis, (B) stomatal conductance, and (C) transpiration of white spruce seedlings from eight seed orchards (SO1 to SO8). Measurements made in August of the second growing season (2+0) (mean and standard error, n = 5 seedlings). For a given variable, averages having the same letter are not significantly different according to a Tukey test (Î± = 0.05).
